page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES AND HOBBIES
page.content: For 100 children in our school between the ages of 6 and 11,{soccer}is the favourite game in school break_time, for games lessons,in clubs and play time in the park.For 40%{cycling}is the favourite outdoor hobby so the cycling proficiency lessons are a necessity.All kinds of{ball games}are popular in the garden.In Swing ball, you have a ball attached by string to a post,so you can get tennis practice when you hit it with a racquet and it bounces back at you.With so much television coverage,{snooker}has become a popular family game as are Monopoly and card games.At parties, about 25% prefer all sorts of Musical games around obstacles.{Collections}of stamps etc.are popular.Some children belong to Girl Guides,Brownies,Cub Scouts,St.John Ambulance Cadets,youth clubs and Girls' Brigade.
